function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Deadly disease outbreak in field hospitals and spread along railway and shipping routes.","Impact":"High mortality and rapid spread of disease.","Mitigation":"Isolation and quarantine measures, strict hygiene protocols, and travel restrictions.","Technologies":"Advanced medical diagnostics and screening technologies, contact tracing apps.","People":"Vulnerable populations near battle lines, returning troops, general public.","Owner":"Government authorities, healthcare organizations, and public health agencies."},{"Description":"Historical reliance on divine explanations and miasma theory for disease outbreaks.","Impact":"Ineffective medical practices and delayed understanding of disease causes.","Mitigation":"Promotion of evidence-based medical research and education, debunking of pseudoscientific theories.","Technologies":"Medical research and data analysis tools, educational platforms and resources.","People":"General public, medical professionals, healthcare researchers.","Owner":"Medical and scientific community, educational institutions, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Misunderstanding of cholera transmission and causes attributed to divine theory and miasma.","Impact":"Ineffective disease control and treatment, leading to higher mortality rates.","Mitigation":"Promotion of evidence-based research, education on disease transmission, and adoption of modern sanitation practices.","Technologies":"Water purification and sanitation systems, medical research and diagnostic tools.","People":"Populations at risk of cholera, public health officials, medical professionals.","Owner":"Public health agencies, government bodies, sanitation organizations."}]}
